You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesE E] > &ecaron;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Ecaron;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/011a/index.htm U+0011A].
  * `&ecaron;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/011b/index.htm U+0011B].
